data.title: Private apartments in Berlin
data.meta_description: À la Maison offers contemporary private apartments in Berlin Tegel surrounded by nature and right next to the forest and Flughafensee.
data.text:
À la Maison will be built right next to the forest. Moreover, the lake Flughafensee is a mere stone’s throw away. The spot always has a very special atmosphere to offer. Depending on the time of day, the water delights with fine wisps of fog or thousands of twinkling bursts of sunlight off its surface. At just under four kilometres, the path around the lake is perfect for a routine running workout.

In addition to its scenic attractions, Tegel is also home to significant cultural monuments, such as the Tegel Palace, Villa Borsig or the Humboldt Library and quite a few industrial monuments. The cosy historic city centre is perfect for relaxing and enjoying a day in the city, perhaps with some shopping or at a pavement café. The Greenwich Promenade on the shore of Lake Tegel is the point of departure for boat tours.

Your front door is a mere 500 metres from the Otisstraße underground station. You can take the U6 line directly to Friedrichstraße without making any transfers. By car, autobahn A111 can be reached in an instant with the motorway connections Holzhauser Straße, Seidelstraße or Eichborndamm, which are just a few minutes’ drive away. Cyclists can take advantage of the fast Berlin-Kopenhagen long distance bike path, which runs from Invalidenstraße in Mitte through Tegel to Spandau.

Tegel offers an excellent infrastructure for shopping. Very popular destinations include Hallen am Borsigturm, a large shopping centre with 115 shops in a listed historic atmosphere, as well as parts of Berliner Straße and the historic city centre.
